title: Knocked out of promos by buggy queue!
body:
Hi, 

I just got a ranked queue counted as a dodge when I clicked accept to go into the lobby and my game decided to hang on "waiting for other players" for ages. Obviously there was no way forwards or backwards so I had to close my game to restart. When I got back in, BAM, dodge penalty. How is that fair at all!? Worse, it was a promo game and now I've been knocked out of promos. How did I dodge when I didn't even get to the lobby? Also your ranked queue is being very unresponsive; makes me think there is something wrong with the servers. It's not my internet, I've done a speed test and everything is normal.

Fix whatever is going on with your ranked queue servers, because this is atrocious and I am really annoyed.

replies.body:
Yes something is wrong with the server

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/n9F6RgnQ-client-issues-8th-apr-2016
Would have been nice to know that BEFORE I queued for ranked.... :(
Well there's a blue '!' in the client :p
Happening to me too but luckily I exited the queue since I experienced bugs before...
